title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5907.1 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5907.1 - Policy

State Regulations

This statement is intended to establish rules and regulations
as required under section
2880
of
the Public Authorities Law describing the prompt payment policy of the New York

State Science and Technology Foundation (the foundation). Subject to the
conditions and exceptions set forth in section
2880
of
the Public Authorities Law and herein, in the event any proper invoice is not
paid promptly the foundation shall be liable for the payment of interest on
late payments. This policy shall apply to all contracts entered into on or
after April 30, 1988. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5907.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
